==German== ===Etymology=== {{prefix|de|wieder|holen}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˌviːdɐˈhoːln̩/|/ˌviːdɐˈhoːlən/}} * {{audio|de|De-wiederholen.ogg|Audio}} * {{hyphenation|de|wie|der|ho|len}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-weak|wiederholt|wiederholte|wiederholt}} # {{lb|de|transitive|or|intransitive}} to [[repeat]] {{gloss|to do or say again}} # {{lb|de|transitive|or|intransitive}} to [[recapitulate]] {{gloss|to summarize or repeat in concise form}} # {{lb|de|transitive|or|intransitive}} to [[revise]], [[review]], [[study]] {{gloss|look over again (something previously written or learned)}} # {{lb|de|transitive|or|intransitive}} to [[play]] again, [[replay]] {{gloss|to perform in (a sport) or participate in (a game) again}} # {{lb|de|transitive}} to [[retake]] {{gloss|to take or do (an exam, penalty shot, etc.) again; to photograph or film again}} # {{lb|de|reflexive}} to [[repeat oneself]] {{gloss|to say again what one has said}} # {{lb|de|reflexive}} to [[recur]], [[repeat]] itself {{gloss|to happen again}} ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-weak|wiederhol|wiederholt|h}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Wiederholung}}
